Detailed Description

The Clustering DBSCAN algorithm.

Function Documentation

void mmwavelib_dbscan ( cplx16_t  locationXY[],
int16_t  speedArray[],
int32_t  epsilon,
float32_t  weight,
uint16_t  numPoints,
uint16_t  minPointsInCluster,
int8_t  scratchBuf[],
uint16_t *  numClusters,
uint16_t  clusterIdxArray[],
mmwavelib_clusterInfor  clusterInfor[] 
)

Function Name : mmwavelib_dbscan.

Description : implements DBSCAN clustering method with fixed point input data
Parameters
[in]locationXY: detected object location information
[in]speedArray: detected object speed array
[in]epsilon: distance and speed threhold for clustering
[in]weight: the weight for the speed
[in]numPoints: the number of detected objects for clustering
[in]minPointsInCluster: minimum number of neighbor points for the tested point to be in a cluster
[in]scratchBuf: scratch memory buffer with length of 4*((numPoints/3+1)*3), must be 8 bytes aligned. it saves the visited buffer, and neighbors index for every cluster
[out]numClusters: the detected number of clusters
[out]clusterIdxArray: the cluster ID for each detected objects, clusterID starts at 1.
[out]clusterInfor: the cluster information, inlcuding center, and min and max value, and variance for each cluster
Returns
none.
Precondition
(1) scratchBuf is 8 byte aligned. (2) input speedArray and locationXY are 8 byte aligned.

cycles cgt:8.1.3 1 cluster: 2.4320 * numPoints^2 + 57487 2 clusters: 2.4317 * numPoints^2 + 56776 4 clusters: 2.4315 * numPoints^2 + 55140 5 clusters: 2.4191 * numPoints^2 + 62838 8 clusters: 2.398 * numPoints^2 + 75288

2.4258 * numPoints^2 + 59108

void mmwavelib_dbscan_calCluster ( cplx16_t  locationXY[],
int16_t  speedArray[],
uint16_t  neighborCount,
uint16_t  neighborList[],
mmwavelib_clusterInfor *  clusterInf 
)

Function Name : mmwavelib_dbscan_calCluster.

Description : calculates the cluster center, size and variance for location and speed using floating point .
Parameters
[in]locationXY: two dimension locations of the detected objects
[in]speedArray: speed array of the detected objects
[in]neighborCount: number of points in the cluster
[in]neighborList: the point index for the detected objects in the culster
[out]clusterInf: pointer to the cluster information structure.
Returns
none
Precondition

cycles cgt 8.1.3 10.1174*neighborCount+218

uint16_t mmwavelib_dbscan_expandCluster ( cplx16_t  locationXY[],
int16_t  speedArray[],
uint16_t  currentNeighborCount,
int32_t  epsilon,
float32_t  weight,
uint16_t  minPointsInCluster,
uint16_t  numPoints,
int8_t  visited[],
int8_t  addIn[],
uint16_t *  neighbor,
uint16_t  clusterId,
uint16_t  clusterIdxArray[] 
)

Function Name : mmwavelib_dbscan_expandCluster.

Description : expands the cluster based on the alreay found neighbors.
Parameters
[in]locationXY: two dimension locations of the detected objects
[in]speedArray: speed array of the detected objects
[in]currentNeighborCount: the number of already found neighbors
[in]epsilon: the distancd and speed threshold for clustering
[in]weight: the weight for the speed
[in]minPointsInCluster: minimum number of neighbor points for the tested point to be in a cluster
[in]numPoints: the total number of objects
[in,out]visited: the global visited buffer.
[in,out]addIn: the buffer to check if an object is already in another's objects neighbor.
[in,out]neighbor: the buffer to save the objects in the neighbor
[in]clusterId: the current cluster ID
[out]clusterIdxArray: the updated cluster ID array
Returns
Number of total found neighbours.
Precondition

cycles

void mmwavelib_dbscan_expandFindNeighbors2 ( cplx16_t  locationXY[],
int16_t  speedArray[],
uint16_t  pointIdx,
int32_t  epsilon,
float32_t  weight,
uint16_t  numPoints,
int8_t  visited[],
int8_t  addIn[],
uint16_t *  numNeighbor,
uint16_t *  numNewNeighbor,
uint16_t *  neighbour 
)

Function Name : mmwavelib_dbscan_expandFindNeighbors2.

Description : implements neighbour expand algorithm for one specfic point based on two dimension locations and speeds of the detected objects, add the found new neighbors into the neighbor buffer
Parameters
[in]locationXY: two dimension locations of the detected objects
[in]speedArray: speed array of the detected objects
[in]pointIdx: the index of the object for finding the neighbours
[in]epsilon: the distancd and speed threshold for clustering
[in]weight: the weight for the speed
[in]numPoints: the total number of detected objects
[in]visited: the global visited array
[in]addIn: the local addIn array to check if the object is alreay added into neighbor
[out]numNeighbor: the total number of found neighbors.
[out]numNewNeighbor: the number of new foud neighbor index.
[out]neighbour: the found neighbor index.
Returns
void
Precondition

cycles

uint16_t mmwavelib_dbscan_findNeighbors2 ( cplx16_t  locationXY[],
int16_t  speedArray[],
uint16_t  pointIdx,
int32_t  epsilon2,
float32_t  weight,
uint16_t  numPoints,
int8_t  visited[],
uint16_t *  neighbor 
)

Function Name : mmwavelib_dbscan_findNeighbors2.

Description : implements neighbour found algorithm for one specfic point based on two dimension locations and speeds of the detected objects,
Parameters
[in]locationXY: two dimension locations of the detected objects
[in]speedArray: speed array of the detected objects
[in]pointIdx: the index of the object for finding the neighbours
[in]epsilon2: the distance and speed threshold for clustering
[in]weight: the weight for the speed
[in]numPoints: the number of detected objects
[in]visited: the global visited array with length of numPoints
[out]neighbor: the found neighbour index.
Returns
Number of found neighbours.
Precondition

cycles cgt(8.1.3) 1.9976*numPoints + 125

void mmwavelib_dbscan_skipFoundNeiB ( cplx16_t  locationXY[],
int16_t  speedArray[],
int32_t  epsilon,
float32_t  weight,
uint16_t  numPoints,
uint16_t  minPointsInCluster,
int8_t  scratchBuf[],
uint16_t *  numClusters,
uint16_t  clusterIdxArray[],
mmwavelib_clusterInfor  clusterInfor[] 
)

Function Name : mmwavelib_dbscan_skipFoundNeiB.

Description : implements DBSCAN clustering method in floating point version by skipping the already found neighbors when expanding the cluster
Parameters
[in]locationXY: detected object location information
[in]speedArray: detected object speed array
[in]epsilon: distance and speed threhold for clustering
[in]weight: the weight for the speed
[in]numPoints: the number of detected objects for clustering
[in]minPointsInCluster: minimum number of neighbour points for a point to be in a cluster
[in]scratchBuf: scratch memory buffer for visited buffer, and neighbour index for each cluster, the length is 3*ceil(numPoints/8)*8, must be 8 bytes aligned
[out]numClusters: the detected number of clusters
[out]clusterIdxArray: the cluster ID for each detected objects, clusterID starts at 1.
[out]clusterInfor: the cluster information, inlcuding center, and min and max value for each cluster
Returns
Number of detected peaks, for this function, it is always 1.
Precondition
(1) scratchBuf is 8 byte aligned. (2) input speedArray and locationXY are 8 byte aligned.

cycles cgt: 8.1.3 1 cluster: 2.1052 * numPoints^2 + 33912 2 clusters: 2.1046 * numPoints^2 + 33828 4 clusters: 2.1040 * numPoints^2 + 33913 5 clusters: 2.0981 * numPoints^2 + 39361 8 clusters: 2.0859 * numPoints^2 + 48195

2.1023 * numPoints^2+35913

uint16_t mmwavelib_dbscan_skipFoundNeiB_expandCluster ( cplx16_t  locationXY[],
int16_t  speedArray[],
uint16_t  currentNeighborCount,
int32_t  epsilon,
float32_t  weight,
uint16_t  minPointsInCluster,
uint16_t  numPoints,
int8_t  visited[],
uint16_t *  neighbor,
uint16_t  clusterId,
uint16_t  clusterIdxArray[] 
)

Function Name : mmwavelib_dbscan_skipFoundNeiB_expandCluster.

Description : expands the cluster based on the found neighbors, when expanding, ignore the already found neighbors
Parameters
[in]locationXY: two dimension locations of the detected objects
[in]speedArray: speed array of the detected objects
[in]currentNeighborCount: the number of already detected neighbours
[in]epsilon: the distancd and speed threshold for clustering
[in]weight: the weight for the speed
[in]minPointsInCluster: the minimum number of neighbors for a point to be in a cluster
[in]numPoints: the total number of objects
[in]visited: the global visited buffer
[in,out]neighbor: the buffer saves the found neighbors
[in]clusterId: the current cluster ID.
[out]clusterIdxArray: the updated cluster ID array
Returns
the total number of found neighbors for the cluster.
Precondition

cycles
